rawConfiguration.text: # Here are some example widgets to get you started!

nrqlQueries.query: FROM Public_APICall select count(*) facet http.url since 1 hour ago
SELECT count(*) FROM Public_APICall facet api since 30 minutes ago WHERE api ='newrelic.com'

rawConfiguration.text:
# Steps to Create your own I|O Quickstart:

**1** - Integrate your data with New Relic  *(JC Notes: Do we have steps for this already, or should we just give a link to reach out to NR to complete this step?)*

**2** - Fork / Clone the [Repo](https://github.com/newrelic/newrelic-quickstarts) to your local machine (Repo link above)

**3** - Copy the '_Template' folder into the Quickstarts folder, and name it

**4** - Create a dashboard from your data integration with your NR Account in [NR1](https://one.newrelic.com/) (note some examples of widgets using NRQL on the right)

**5** - Copy/Paste the JSON of the dashboard into your cloned Repo

**6** - Update your Repo with a dashboard screenshot, update the config file with the name of your quickstart, and update the logo file to the logo you want for the quickstart

**7** - Merge your changes, and create a pull request to the parent Repo

nrqlQueries.query: FROM Public_APICall select average(duration) facet api SINCE 1 day ago
SELECT api,http.method,duration,http.url FROM Public_APICall WHERE duration >1.5 SINCE 1 day ago

rawConfiguration.text:
## Welcome to I|O quickstart!

Get Started with these helpful links
* [I|O Overview](https://docs.newrelic.com/docs/using-new-relic/welcome-new-relic/get-started/new-relic-quickstarts-overview/)
* [Quickstart Repo](https://github.com/newrelic/newrelic-quickstarts)
* [I|O Quickstart Catalog](https://developer.newrelic.com/instant-observability/)
* [API Wiki](https://developer.newrelic.com/try-our-apis/)
* [I|O Nerdlog](https://newrelic.com/blog/nerdlog/instant-observability-quickstarts)
